author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Rumors have been circulating that Hollywood celebrities Glen Powell and Sydney Sweeney have entered a relationship. While fans are surprised and excited by the rumors, Powell’s own ex, Gigi Paris, is not so happy. In fact, Paris is slamming Powell over the rumors that he’s now with Sweeney. Paris shared her comments on the podcast [...]

The post Glen Powell’s Ex Slams Actor Over Sydney Sweeney Romance Rumors appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Glen Powell’s Ex Slams Actor Over Sydney Sweeney Romance Rumors

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Zoe Saldaña won her first Oscar earlier this year for her role in Emilia Pérez. Now Zoe Saldaña has given an update at the premiere of her latest film, Elio, specifically referring to the status of her Oscar statue. As shared via People, Saldaña was asked about the current whereabouts of the award. While she [...]

title: Zoe Saldaña Says Her “Gender Fluid” Oscar Statue Is “Trans” With “They/Them” Pronouns

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
With a similar business model to other streaming services, Disney Plus has had to make some tough calls since the platform’s launch, which has included several shows being axed prematurely or with the potential to be continued. Now one such Marvel series may be receiving this fate with only one season on Disney Plus. The [...]
